General.Name: Linhai Co Ltd
General.Description: Linhai Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of motorcycles, all-terrain vehicles, mini tractors, generators, and multi-purpose engines in China. Its primary products include motorcycle-engines, small gasoline engines, mopeds, forestry machineries, fire-fighting machineries, and sprinklers for sports ground. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Taizhou, China.
General.Address: No.199, Yingchun West Road, Taizhou, China, 225300
